word:
The parable of the wicked servant was regarded as applying to those who desired to put off the coming of the Lord: "If that evil servant 
                                                                           255
shall say in his heart, My lord delayeth his coming; and shall begin to smite his fellow-servants, and to eat and drink with the drunken; the lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him, and in an hour that he is not aware of, and shall cut him asunder, and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites." [Matthew 24:48-51.]
